comment: The build quality is not upto the mark. I ordered the mirror as the Chevy dealer doesn't have the stock. The seller has sent the mirror manufactured by Raiyan auto. The mirror vibrates while driving as the material is not stiff enough. Better to go for good quality OEM part if available.
